This model is a continuously trained version of [BERTimbau](https://huggingface.co/neuralmind/bert-large-portuguese-cased) on a dataset with bills of Brazilian law proposals.

Model: [https://huggingface.co/belisards/congretimbau](https://huggingface.co/belisards/congretimbau)

Training data: [belisards/ementas_camarabr_1934_2024](https://huggingface.co/datasets/belisards/ementas_camarabr_1934_2024) and [belisards/ementas_senado_1946_2024](https://huggingface.co/datasets/belisards/ementas_senado_1946_2024)
